summary: Professional, mobile-responsive website for the Common Service Centre 'Iniyazh Online Service' with branded (logo-matched) blue/white government-style design and core contact/service sections.
architectural_notes: Brand styling: blue/white professional government-style theme; match colors to uploaded logo.
Use uploaded logo asset in header, favicon, and footer.

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-responsive multi-page website with the pages: Home, About Us, Services, and Contact, with consistent header/footer navigation across all pages.
Apply the uploaded logo (2025-08-25.webp) in the header (top-left), footer, and as the site favicon.
Implement a clean, professional blue-and-white government-style theme that also harmonizes with the logo colors (use logo accent colors where appropriate), and apply it consistently across all pages.

Add the business identity content throughout the site using English text: Business Name: "Iniyazh Online Service"; Owner/VLE: "Dinesh Dhashinamoorthy"; Contact Number: "9952666599"; Address: "3/4 North Street, Narasingamangalam, Valangaiman TK, Thiruvarur District".
Add a floating WhatsApp button on all pages that opens a WhatsApp chat to 9952666599 using an internationalized wa.me link.
Build a Services page/section that lists common CSC-style services and displays a clear icon for each service item.
Add a Contact page contact form with fields for Name, Phone, Email (optional), Subject, and Message, including client-side validation and a clear success/failure state after submission.

Add a Google Map section on the Contact page that shows the business location/address using an embedded Google Maps iframe for: "3/4 North Street, Narasingamangalam, Valangaiman TK, Thiruvarur District".
Add CSC ID "666236760012" to the centralized business content model and render it in the websiteâ€™s business information sections (at minimum: Contact page and site footer) using English labels.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create 4-page website: Home, About Us, Services, Contact
Apply uploaded logo to header (top-left), favicon, and footer
Design styling: clean blue/white government-style theme matching logo colors; mobile responsive
Add WhatsApp floating button linking to 9952666599
Add contact form on Contact page
Add Google Map section for business address
Add service icons for Services section/page
Include business details (name, owner/VLE, contact number, address) in appropriate sections (header/footer/contact)
Implement backend storage for contact form submissions in the single Motoko actor, including a method to create a submission and a method to list submissions (for future admin use).
Add CSC ID "666236760012" to the website content (appropriate section such as header/footer/contact/about).
